commentText:
Utility method to clear all {@link AbstractSObjectBase} fields._

Used when reusing a DTO for a new record.
codeText: public final void clearBaseFields() {_        attributes = null__        Id = null__        OwnerId = null__        IsDeleted = null__        Name = null__        CreatedDate = null__        CreatedById = null__        LastModifiedDate = null__        LastModifiedById = null__        SystemModstamp = null__        LastActivityDate = null__    }

commentText:
Utility method to clear all system {@link AbstractSObjectBase} fields._

Useful when reusing a DTO for a new record, or for update/upsert.

_

This method does not clear {@code Name} to allow updating it, so it must be explicitly set to {@code null} if needed.
codeText: public final void clearBaseFields() {_        attributes = null__        Id = null__        OwnerId = null__        IsDeleted = null__        CreatedDate = null__        CreatedById = null__        LastModifiedDate = null__        LastModifiedById = null__        SystemModstamp = null__        LastActivityDate = null__    }
